short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool to help Power Platform developers share the contents of a solution

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to quickly share Solutions and their contents with other developers. The extension allows you to:

-Share
-Stop Sharing
-Change Owner

Currently supports:
-Connection References
-Environment Variables
-Flows
-Custom Connectors

With more planned

Please note the extension uses your access to the Power Platform so:
-You will need access to the components to share
-You must be signed into make.powerautomate.com or make.powerapps.com
-Your Tenenat admin must not have blocked the Dataverse api
